author: snoopdave
msg: "This patch roller_maven_ant_task_070810.patch (roller trunk #564549) enables deployment of the roller-weblogger.war file to a remote maven repository. Deployment is done via a new ant target (in the top level build.xml) by usage of the maven-ant-task.

After installing this patch and the maven-ant-tasks-2.0.7.jar (from http://maven.apache.org/download.html) into roller_base_dir/tools/buildtime/maven/ you will be able to deploy the war file by issuing 'ant mvn-deploy'. "

author: snoopdave
msg: "WeblogCalendarModel should use timezone setting of weblog consistently"
